tool_description: Accesses Multiple Listing Service databases to retrieve current and historical listing information, pricing data, and market activity for properties.

search_radius.description: Search radius in miles for similar properties

include_sold.description: Include recently sold properties in results

date_range_days.description: Number of days back to search for listings

error_messages: No search criteria provided: Either mls_number or property_address must be provided.
MLS access denied: Invalid credentials or subscription expired. Verify MLS access permissions.
Invalid search radius: Search radius must be between 0.1 and 5.0 miles.
No MLS data found: No listings found matching the search criteria. Try expanding search parameters.
usage: Provide either an MLS number for specific listing data or a property address to search for current and recent listings in the area.

listing_price.description: Current or most recent listing price

days_on_market.description: Number of days the property has been listed

nearby_listings.description: Similar properties currently or recently listed in the area
